CustomField.formula: (IF(INCLUDES( RH_description_fields__c , 'RH_ProjectId__c'), RH_ProjectId__r.Name +' ', '')+ IF(INCLUDES( RH_description_fields__c , 'RH_Ressource__c'), RH_Ressource__r.LastName +' '+RH_Ressource__r.FirstName +' ' , '') + IF(INCLUDES( RH_description_fields__c , 'RH_Subject__c'), RH_Subject__c +' ' , ''))
CustomField.label: Title
